mod.description: A Space Stage overhaul mod for SPORE. Aimed to make the game loop in Space more enjoyable by incorperating modern game elements such as resource gathering, crafting and brand new achievements. Serves as the basis for many potential add-ons.

component.description: The core components of RattlerSPORE, contains mineral tiers 1-3. If you do not prefer most of the overhaul elements, but wish to keep the mining. Only install this. Otherwise, select to your heart's content!
This difficulty is for more casual players of SPORE. The recipe prices are half off.
The intended difficulty of RattlerSPORE. Is a tad grindy.
Doubles the prices of all recipes, making the mod even more grindy. WARNING: DO NOT USE UNLESS YOU HAVE A MOD THAT ALLOWS YOU TO CARRY MORE THAN 99 SPICE.
Adds new craftable items that sell for quite a bit. They will be used in future addons.
Allows spices to be crafted into each other using late-game Fleshy Mass.
Makes every recipe in the game free. For players who want to showcase the mod, or have very little patience. WARNING: Spamming the fabricator on low-end devices could cause a crash.
